description:
Misato is a student at Kaimei High School who was the primary cause for Akina and Chiaki`s falling out, due to the former`s feelings for him. He appears to be a kind, down-to-earth person and ends up urging the girls to reconcile. He is also the one who informs Chiaki that Akina is changing schools.
Source: Sket Dance Wikia
name: Misato
